title: Why Routines Are Great For Weightloss (and Life)
itunes:title: Why Routines Are Great For Weightloss (and Life)
description:
Get the Free Course here:
http://phit.click/freecourse

In today's podcast we talk all about routines. Your brain loves a solid routine. It finds comfort in the repetition.
 
Listen in to hear about how a great morning and evening routine can set you up for the day and give you lots of support as you lose your weight.
